comments.content: Please dont think. that answer literally defies the purpose of Static Groups.

discussion.content: I think teh correct answer is C

choices.D: You want the group to contain hosts from multiple operating systems
choices.C: You need hosts to be automatically assigned to a group
choices.B: You are managing more than 1000 hosts
choices.A: You do not want the group membership to change automatically
Individual hosts selected by the administrator
choices.D: Only the groups selected by the administrator
choices.B: Either all hosts or specified groups

questions.question_text: What can exclusions be applied to?
You have a Windows host on your network in Reduced functionality mode (RFM). While the system is in RFM, which of the following is TRUE?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct, found in the docs

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct. Like verified also by CrowdStrike support, some detection like for example privilege escalation will not be triggered but only logged.

choices.D: Some detection patterns and preventions will not be triggered
choices.C: Prevention patterns will not be triggered
